notes.title: Authors’ contributions
notes.p: All authors were engaged in the conception, planning and conduct of the symposium. The main event was chaired by WL and AA and co-chaired by EM and BPS. WL, JS, BPS and EM kept notes throughout the event. WL, LH, BPS, HC and GF wrote the final manuscript. All authors revised and agreed with the final manuscript. The author(s) read and approved the final manuscript.
